Fixes.name: Fixed Pistons
Fixes.description:
Fixes the underside of the Piston Head to look more fitting. Also gives the side of the Sticky Piston a bit of slime to distinguish both types of Piston.

inspiration{[Vanilla Tweaks](https://vanillatweaks.net/)}

Fixes.name: Fixed Furnace
Fixes.description: Fixes the underside of Furnaces and Lit Furnaces. Now displays a modified version of the Smooth Stone topside.

Fixes.name: Fixed Crafting Table
Fixes.description: Fixes the underside of the Crafting Table. Now displays a simply modified Oak Planks texture.

Fixes.name: Fixed Pumpkins
Fixes.description:
Fixes the underside of the Pumpkin. Also applies to Jack o'Lanterns.

overrideslave{Pumpkin Complete Pack}
incompat{Randomized Pumpkin}

Fixes.name: Golden Totem of Undying
Fixes.description:
Changes the Totem of Undying's texture into actual Gold.

requiresefr

Fixes.name: Fixed Weighted Pressure Plates
Fixes.description: Changes the top texture of the Weighted Pressure Plates so that they have a rim around them.

Fixes.name: Sand Concrete Powders
Fixes.description: Changes the textures for Concrete Powders to use the Sand lineart.

Fixes.name: Colored Stems
Fixes.description: Applies coloration to the Pumpkin and Melon Stems in their normal and attached form.

Fixes.name: Deepslate Ore Top Textures
Fixes.description:
Provides a dedicated top texture to all Deepslate Ores.

requiresefr

incompat{Unlit Redstone Ore}

Fixes.name: Fixed Shulkers
Fixes.description:
Changes the textures for Shulkers and Shulker Boxes that haven't been touched by Jappa.

requiresefr

Fixes.name: Gilded Blackstone Top Textures
Fixes.description:
Provides a dedicated top texture to Gilded Blackstone.

requiresefr

Fixes.name: Better Opaque Leaves
Fixes.description:
Fixes the black pixels on the 'Fast' setting Leaves textures to be more in line with the Leaves of the trees added in later versions.

inspiration{Vanilla Tweaks](https://vanillatweaks.net/)}

overrideslave{Darker Dark Oak Leaves}

Fixes.name: Fixed Campfires
Fixes.description:
Changes Campfires to be free of ash when they're not lit. Also applies a Soul Soil texture to Soul Campfires.

requiresmod{[CampfireBackport](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/campfire-backport)}

inspiration{[Vanilla Tweaks](https://vanillatweaks.net/)}

⚠️ Careful: This Addon can't simply be placed into the `assets/minecraft` folder. You have to place it into the `assets` folder, because the `campfirebackport` folder is in the Addon itself!

Fixes.name: 1.19.4 Potion Colors
Fixes.description:
Changes the textures of all Potions, Splash Potions and Lingering Potions of Vanilla and Et Futurum Requiem to make them use their 1.19.4 colors.

requiresefr

⚠️ Careful: This Addon is a bit overkill. Not only does it replace all the potion colors using a `color.properties` file, it also replaces every single potion in (as I hope) every possible configuration with a finished texture that overrides the vanilla 'bottle + potion overlay' system. This is not technically necessary to change the potion colors, but it gets rid of the Enchantment Glint, that was also removed from potions in 1.19.4.

Fixes.name: Lowered Nether Sprouts
Fixes.description:
Changes the item texture of the Nether Sprouts so that the player is actually holding it.

requiresefr

Fixes.name: Fixed Blast Furnace
Fixes.description:
Fixes the underside of Blast Furnaces and Lit Blast Furnaces. Now displays a modified version of the Smooth Stone topside with a modified palette.

requiresefr

Fixes.name: Fixed Trapdoor Sides
Fixes.description:
Fixes the side textures of all Trapdoors.

requiresefr

#78B159{Attached is an additional file that makes the Copper Trapdoors consistent with __Actually Waxed Copper__.}
